alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 09 at 8:18PM MST until July 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 817 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Chandler Fashion Center Mall to 7 miles west of Bapchule to 6 miles southeast of Maricopa to near Chui-Chu, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 171. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 139 and 173. AZ Route 202 near mile marker 50. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Estrella, Freeman, Estrella Sailport, Firebird Lake, Mobile, Rainbow Valley, Stanfield, Ak-Chin Village and East Chui-Chu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
